display_long_description:
With the gameplay of **Phasmophobia & Lethal Company**, that becomes the most popular co-op horror games. 
                                                                                             
[media]
**discord.gg/hsvr** join to win gifts🎁                                                                                          
**Full game: meta.com/experiences/6847023095354894**
[media]
# 👻Play with squad, chase&catch the demon (Easy Peasy!!)
- **Find the Room**: Spot odd objects, hear whispers, is the demon room nearby?
- **Use Items&Props**: Throw **Holy Water** to find demon shadows! Hold **Cross** to track footsteps!

[media]
- **Find demon's name**: Solve puzzles & put right item on platform. 

[media]
- **RUN OR HIDE**: Hide in closets, scare demons away with the Bible. **More props** to fight demons, so much FUN!
# ☠️Why So Fun?
- **Interaction**: Push the doors, answer the calls, real scenes, explore freely!
- **Voice Chat**: Chat while running. After being killed, be a ghost to give clues!
- **Coin Frenzy**: Earn coins & buy **Freddie bear masks**. Dress up!

[media]
# ☠️FREE Version? Still AWESOME!
- **Big Mansion map + Classic Mode**: Play with friends all night!
- **Crazy Mode**: Unlock in Discord. Fight 10 demon powers!

# ☠️If You're Addicted to...
Animal Company\Noclip\Yeep‘s thrilling chase, our hunting system will drive you crazy! Demons climb, break doors, and fake your friend.
